title: Poster, International Design Center Nagoya: Tanaka, late 20th century
signed: Imprinted in black, lower left corner: "Designed by Ikko Tanaka in collaboration with Toppan Printing Co. Ltd. & Takeo Co. Ltd."
inscribed: Imprinted in black, lower right corner: logo (profile of bird) "IdcN International Design Center Nagoya Inc." followed by Japanese text.
description: Poster for International Design Center in Nagoya.  Using color contrast with irregular division of poster.  Four horizontal sections.  Top, imprinted in black: "IdcN".  Inversed pink triangular shape next to "I" with two black circles near base, like beak of bird on white background.  Second: green irregular trapezoid-like shape sloping downward on right side.  Second trapezoid superimpose in purple on left side.  Third: on left side, rectangle divided diagonally into two similiar sections with left part in yellow and right part in red. On right side, a square divided diagonally into two similiar sections with left part in white and right part in blue.  Bottom: divided vertically in two similiar section with left part in olive green and right part in pale green.  Name and credits in black across bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, International Design Center Nagoya: Tanaka, late 20th century. Offset lithography. 
Gift of Unknown Donor. 1996-129-4
